snippet: A 24-year-old man was charged Tuesday with plotting to run over an American serviceman and then kill him with a knife in an attack.
abstract: British man Junead Ahmed Khan faces terrorism charges in London for allegedly plotting to run over American serviceman and kill him in knife attack.
lead_paragraph: A 24-year-old man was charged Tuesday with plotting to run over an American serviceman and then kill him with a knife in an attack.

headline.main: Man Charged With Plotting to Kill U.S. Serviceman in Britain
headline.print_headline: Man Accused of Plot to Kill an American
